text: Ani tumhi tyanna nuhaca vrttanta vacuna aikava, jevha te apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale, he majhya jatibandhavanno! Jara tumhala majhe rahane ani allahacya adesanci sikavana dene jada jate (asahya hote) tevha majha tara allahavaraca bharosa ahe. Tumhi apali yojana apalya sathidaransi miluna majabuta karuna ghya, matra tumaci yojana, tumacyasathi mana gudamaranyace karana tharu naye. Maga majhe (kaya karayace te) karuna taka ani mala sandhihi de'u naka
